content.text: Building a business webpage from scratch
A business website can have many different kinds of sections.

content.text: 1. Hero.

content.text: The hero section is the first thing people see when they enter your business website.

content.text: It is displayed under the menu.

content.text: The hero section helps the reader understand what you offer, why someone should work with you, and the value you provide with your services.

content.text: 2. About Us section.

content.text: Give the reader a summary of your business.
